mapper.select: SELECT PWD FROM ${dbName}.USER WHERE USER_NAME= #{uName}
SELECT r.ROLE_NAME from ${dbName}.ROLE r join ${dbName}.USER_ROLE ur ON r.ROLE_ID=ur.ROLE_ID join ${dbName}.USER u on ur.USER_ID=u.USER_ID WHERE u.USER_NAME = #{uName}

SELECT p.PRIVILEGES_NAME FROM ${dbName}.PRIVILEGES p join ${dbName}.ROLE_PRIVILEGES rp on p.PRIVILEGES_ID=rp.PRIVILEGES_ID join ${dbName}.ROLE r on rp.ROLE_ID=r.ROLE_ID WHERE r.ROLE_NAME = #{roleName}
SELECT * FROM ${dbName}.user u JOIN ${dbName}.USER_OPERATE_PRIVILEGES_RELATE uopr on u.ID=uopr.USER_ID where u.USER_NAME=#{uName}
SELECT a.* FROM ${opTableName} a, ${orprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.OPERATE_ROLE_ID=#{operatRoleId}

SELECT a.* FROM ${opTableName} a, ${orprTableName} b,${uorrTableName} c WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_PRIVILEGE_ID AND b.OPERATE_ROLE_ID=c.OPERATE_ROLE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND c.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${orTableName} a, ${uorrTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_ROLE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${opTableName} a, ${uoprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT a.* FROM ${opTableName} a, ${orprTableName} b, ${uorrTableName} c WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_PRIVILEGE_ID AND b.OPERATE_ROLE_ID=c.OPERATE_ROLE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND c.USER_ID=#{userId} union SELECT a.* FROM ${opTableName} a, ${uoprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.OPERATE_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${dpTableName} a, ${drprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.DATA_ROLE_ID=#{dataRoleId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${drTableName} a, ${udrrTableName} b where a.ID=b.DATA_ROLE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${dpTableName} a, ${udprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT b.ID as id,b.DATA_PRIVILEGES_NAME as dataPrivilegesName, b.DATA_DEFINITION as dataDefinition, a.DATA_TYPE_NAME as dataTypeName, a.TABLE_NAME as tableName from ${dtTableName} a JOIN ${dpTableName} b ON a.ID=b.DATA_TYPE_ID AND b.IS_VALID=0 AND b.IS_SEALED=0

SELECT e.ID as id, a.DATA_ROLE_NAME as dataRoleName, b.DATA_PRIVILEGES_NAME as dataPrivileges, d.DATA_TYPE_NAME as dataTypeName, d.TABLE_NAME as tableName, e.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, e.UPDATE_USER_ID as updateUserId FROM ${drTableName} a,${dpTableName} b,${dsTableName} c,${dtTableName} d,${drprTableName} e WHERE a.ID=e.DATA_ROLE_ID AND b.ID=e.DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID AND c.ID=e.SCENE_ID AND d.ID=e.DATA_TYPE_ID AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND b.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.IS_VALID=0 AND c.IS_SEALED=0 AND c.IS_VALID=0 AND d.IS_SEALED=0 AND d.IS_VALID=0 AND a.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND b.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId}
${key}='${item}'
SELECT a.* FROM ${fpTableName} a, ${frprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.FUNC_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.FUNC_ROLE_ID=#{funcRoleId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${fpTableName} a, ${ufprTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.FUNC_PRIVILEGE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${frTableName} a, ${ufrrTableName} b WHERE a.ID=b.FUNC_ROLE_ID AND a.IS_VALID=0 AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.USER_ID=#{userId}

SELECT e.ID as id, a.REAL_NAME as realName, b.DATA_PRIVILEGES_NAME as dataPrivileges, d.DATA_TYPE_NAME as dataTypeName, d.TABLE_NAME as tableName, e.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, e.UPDATE_USER_ID as updateUserId FROM ${uTableName} a,${dpTableName} b,${dsTableName} c,${dtTableName} d,${udprTableName} e WHERE a.ID=e.USER_ID AND b.ID=e.DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID AND c.ID=e.SCENE_ID AND d.ID=e.DATA_TYPE_ID AND a.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.IS_SEALED=0 AND b.IS_VALID=0 AND c.IS_SEALED=0 AND c.IS_VALID=0 AND d.IS_SEALED=0 AND d.IS_VALID=0 AND a.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId} AND b.TENANT_ID=#{tenantId}
${key}='${item}'
SELECT a.* FROM ${funModuleTab} a,${funPriTab} b where a.FUNC_PRIVILEGE_ID=b.ID and b.ID=#{funPriId}
SELECT a.* FROM ${drprTableName} a LEFT JOIN ${udrrTableName} b ON a.DATA_ROLE_ID = b.DATA_ROLE_ID AND b.USER_ID = #{userId};

SELECT a.*,c.*,b.* FROM ${udprTableName} a LEFT JOIN ${dpTableName} c ON c.ID = a.DATA_PRIVILEGE_ID LEFT JOIN ${dtTableName} b ON b.ID = a.DATA_TYPE_ID WHERE a.DATA_TYPE_ID = #{dataSignId} AND a.USER_ID = #{userId};
SELECT a.* FROM ${drprTableName} a LEFT JOIN ${udrrTableName} b ON a.DATA_ROLE_ID = b.DATA_ROLE_ID AND b.USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE a.DATA_TYPE_ID = #{dataSignId};
SELECT a.*, b.NAME, b.SCENE_GROUP_OP, b.PARENT_ID, b.ID_TREE, b.NAME_TREE FROM ${dsrTableName} a LEFT JOIN ${dsrgTableName} b ON a.SCENE_RULE_GROUP_ID = b.ID WHERE a.SCENE_ID = #{sceneId};
